original_text: You shall regard them as detestable; you shall not eat any of their flesh, and you shall detest their carcasses.
korean_text: 이들은 너희에게 가증한 것이니 너희는 그 고기를 먹지 말고 그 주검을 가증히 여기라

sentences.original_text: You shall regard them as detestable
you shall not eat any of their flesh
and you shall detest their carcasses
